#summary HOWTO: Install Family Finance.

= HOWTO: Install Family Finance. =

  # Make sure that you have installed the SQLce 3.1 on your computer. This is Microsoft's  Compact Edition of SQL Server, and is the database engine that Family Finance uses.
  # After Family Finance runs the first time it will create the database file FamilyFinanceDB.sdf. Keep this and FamilyFinance.exe in the same directory and all should run well.

If you get an error saying that you need to install a version of the .NET Framework v2.0.xxxxx then you need to download ind install this file.

[.NET Framework v2.0]
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=0856eacb-4362-4b0d-8edd-aab15c5e04f5&displaylang=en
